entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tisdale

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
